# `404` Page Not Found

This site doesn’t have a page for this URL<script>document.write("of <code>" + location.pathname + "</code>")</script>. 

<dl>
  <dt>Check if the URL is correct
  <dd>There might be a typo. Pokémon names are hard to spell.
  <dd>Other sites/apps can add spurious characters to links &mdash; usually punctuation at the end.

  <dt>The page might have moved
  <dd>You can try a search,
  <dd>Or <s><a href="/sitemap.xml">look in the sitemap</a></s>. (When Tigt makes one…)

  <dt>If all else fails…
  <dd><a href="https://discord.gg/FCTZ4FUzXd">Yell about the error on Discord</a>, or
  <dd><a href="https://github.com/tigt/ptv/issues">Open an issue about this missing page.</a>
</dl>
